hook_patterns: You won't believe what happens when...
I tried {topic} for {time} and here's what happened
The one thing {authority} doesn't want you to know
Are you making these {number} common {topic} mistakes?
The truth about {topic} will shock you
I spent {time} studying {topic} and here's what I found
What {influencer} doesn't want you to know about {topic}
The {number} second rule that changes everything
engagement_baits: Let me know in the comments what you think about {topic}
Can you guess the answer to this {topic} question?
Share your favorite {topic} tip in the comments
Do you agree or disagree with this {topic} statement?
Tag a friend who needs to see this {topic} video
Save this video for later and let me know what you think
scroll_stop_openers: I just discovered a secret that will change your life forever
You're about to learn the one thing that {authority} doesn't want you to know
What if I told you there's a way to {desirable_outcome} in just {time}?
I'm about to share with you the most important {topic} lesson I've ever learned
This {topic} hack will save you {time} and {money}
The truth about {topic} is not what you think
I tried {topic} for {time} and the results were astonishing
The #1 {topic} mistake that's costing you {money} every year
retention_tricks: Start with a hook that grabs attention
Use storytelling to make the content more relatable
Ask questions to keep the viewer engaged
Use visuals to break up the content
Provide valuable information that solves a problem
End with a call-to-action that encourages engagement
cta_formulas: Take the first step towards {desirable_outcome} by {action}
Join the {number} people who have already {action}
